destinations.title: Paris
destinations.excerpt: The city of lights and romance.
destinations.description: Paris, the capital of France, is renowned for its art, gastronomy, and culture. Visit iconic landmarks like the Eiffel Tower, Louvre Museum, and Notre-Dame Cathedral. Wander along the Seine River and enjoy charming cafes on every corner.

destinations.title: Tokyo
destinations.description: Tokyo is a bustling metropolis blending ultramodern and traditional styles. Explore ancient temples, indulge in sushi and ramen, and experience cutting-edge technology in districts like Akihabara and Shibuya. Don't miss the beautiful cherry blossom season in spring.
destinations.imageAlt: Cherry blossoms with Tokyo city skyline

destinations.title: New York City
destinations.description: New York City is famous for its towering skyscrapers, diverse culture, and vibrant nightlife. Visit the Statue of Liberty, Central Park, Broadway theaters, and explore world-class museums like the MET. Enjoy a slice of authentic New York pizza while walking down Times Square.
destinations.imageAlt: Aerial view of Central Park in New York City

destinations.title: Sydney
destinations.excerpt: Iconic opera house and sunny beaches.
destinations.description: Sydney offers stunning beaches like Bondi and Manly, the iconic Sydney Opera House, and the Sydney Harbour Bridge. Enjoy outdoor adventures, vibrant markets, and multicultural cuisine in this sunny city on the Australian coast.
destinations.imageAlt: Sydney Opera House and Harbour Bridge on a sunny day

destinations.title: Rome
destinations.excerpt: History and art at every corner.
destinations.description: Rome is a treasure trove of ancient history and architecture. Explore the Colosseum, Roman Forum, Vatican Museums, and Sistine Chapel. Savor authentic Italian pasta and gelato while strolling through charming piazzas and fountains.
destinations.imageAlt: Colosseum lit by sunset in Rome

destinations.title: Cape Town
destinations.description: Cape Town is famed for its breathtaking landscapes, including Table Mountain and Cape Point. Discover vibrant cultural neighborhoods, beautiful beaches, and world-class vineyards nearby. Adventure seekers can enjoy hiking, surfing, and safaris.
destinations.imageAlt: Table Mountain rising above Cape Town city

destinations.title: Barcelona
destinations.description: Barcelona is known for its unique architecture by Antoni Gaudí, including Sagrada Familia and Park Güell. Enjoy sunny beaches, delicious tapas, and a lively nightlife. Wander through the Gothic Quarter and the famous La Rambla street.

destinations.title: Istanbul
destinations.description: Istanbul is a city rich in history, culture, and stunning architecture. Explore the Hagia Sophia, Blue Mosque, and Grand Bazaar. Enjoy delicious Turkish cuisine and experience the unique blend of European and Asian influences.

destinations.title: Reykjavik
destinations.excerpt: Gateway to the land of fire and ice.
destinations.description: Reykjavik is a charming capital city surrounded by Iceland’s dramatic landscapes. Witness the Northern Lights, geothermal spas, and volcanic terrain. It’s perfect for nature lovers and those seeking unique outdoor experiences.

destinations.title: Marrakech
destinations.description: Marrakech captivates visitors with its colorful souks, beautiful palaces, and lively medinas. Explore the Jardin Majorelle, enjoy traditional Moroccan cuisine, and take trips into the Sahara Desert for unforgettable adventures.

destinations.title: Rio de Janeiro
destinations.description: Rio is famous for its Carnival festival, beautiful beaches like Copacabana, and the iconic Christ the Redeemer statue. Enjoy samba music, vibrant nightlife, and scenic views from Sugarloaf Mountain.

destinations.title: Bangkok
destinations.excerpt: Temples, street food, and bustling markets.
destinations.description: Bangkok is a lively city offering ornate temples, bustling street markets, and some of the best street food in the world. Explore the Grand Palace, take a boat ride along the Chao Phraya River, and immerse yourself in Thai culture and hospitality.

destinations.title: Lisbon
destinations.description: Lisbon blends traditional charm with modern energy. Ride the famous yellow trams, enjoy views from São Jorge Castle, and explore colorful neighborhoods like Alfama. The food, music, and sea breeze make it unforgettable.

destinations.title: Prague
destinations.excerpt: Medieval charm in the heart of Europe.
destinations.description: Prague is known for its fairytale architecture, the Astronomical Clock, and Charles Bridge. Wander through cobbled streets and enjoy Czech beer in one of the many historic pubs.

destinations.title: Vancouver
destinations.description: Vancouver offers stunning natural scenery and a high quality of life. Go skiing in Whistler, stroll through Stanley Park, or enjoy multicultural cuisine in the downtown core.

destinations.title: Vienna
destinations.description: Vienna is the cultural heart of Europe, home to classical composers, grand palaces, and rich history. Visit Schönbrunn Palace, enjoy a concert, and sip coffee in a historic café.

destinations.title: Seoul
destinations.description: Seoul is a city of contrasts—ancient palaces meet modern skyscrapers. Shop in Myeongdong, eat Korean BBQ, and explore vibrant districts like Hongdae and Gangnam.

destinations.title: Dubrovnik
destinations.description: Dubrovnik offers a unique blend of medieval architecture and coastal views. Walk the ancient city walls, swim in the Adriatic, and enjoy Mediterranean food under stone arches.

destinations.title: Buenos Aires
destinations.description: Buenos Aires is the cultural capital of South America. Experience tango shows, steakhouse dinners, and neoclassical architecture. Walk through colorful La Boca and elegant Recoleta.

destinations.title: Athens
destinations.description: Athens is a vibrant capital full of history. Visit the Acropolis, explore ancient ruins, and enjoy delicious Greek cuisine. Perfect for history buffs and sunny city lovers.
